ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Digest Number 928
ygData.msgSnippet: I got a question..on your billing account info isn t there a option to go from basic to Legends in which you pay more monthly but you also get lots of GM
ygData.messageBody:
I got a question..on your billing account info isn't there a option to go
from basic to "Legends" in which you pay more monthly but you also get lots
of GM events and better customor support..am I right?

Bloodbrood Deathdisciple <Ceatlitus>
Shadowknight of the 30th Season

-----Original Message-----
From: Mac [mailto:bigmaca3@...]
Sent: Sunday, January 11, 2004 7:13 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Re: Digest Number 928


Well, that's the main reason for Stormhammer. When that opened it
was supposed to have constant GM support and events daily. Now even
they don't see GM's or have events very often.

You'll just have to hope your A GM wants to run one.

Tul

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, go2viper@a... wrote:

once i
